review_data.title: Best Imbiss ever
review_data.content: Service ist mega herzlich uns sympathisch. Essen ist hervorragend. Ich finde das Schüler-Menu super (10 Fr. für Kebap und Getränk).

review_data.title: Nice for a quick bite
review_data.content: Just went there to grab something quick to eat on my way home. I got a kebab wrap. It was OK but nothing special. I would go somewhere else given the choice.

review_data.title: Bester Kebab
review_data.content: Bester Kebab weit und breit. Sehr schnelle und sehr sympathische Mitarbeiter. Ab sofort mein Stammlokal. Werde sicher weiter empfehlen.

review_data.title: Amazing food
review_data.content: It was my first time in Toros, we had a lovely meal there with my family. Kebab was amazing really tasty, my wife had a home made hamburger with Fries meat was juicy and very tender. We will definitely come again at our next trips...More

review_data.title: Delicious, affordable food in accessible Oerlikon
review_data.content: I stayed at a nearby hotel in Zurich-Oerlikon and ate here twice. (If I were travelling solo I would have eaten here daily, if not 2x/day). This cafe offers a wide variety of shoarma, donors, sandwiches and other Mediterranean delights, deli-style. You can take your...More
